comment: Smells like acetone. Spicy going down
This is almost brandy.  It smells like sweet apples and dry white wine.  The barrel shows on the palate with some vanilla, caramel and a bit of oak alongside the green apple and grape.
Very good. Smooth, notes of fruits. Prefer sherry more.
How can something be so smooth ? Amazing
Lots of pear on nose. Light caramel on palate. Buttery sweetness on finish. Good

Nose: caramel and sweetness
Body: medium
Palate: sweet
Finish: medium
Note: ok to good
